notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: MC and PH designed the project. All authors contributed to the design of the protocol. LS, CM, AS, VL, NM, CH, CG, and BB carried out the pilot. LS, AH, and PH identified clinical research priorities. LS, AS, CM, MC, and PH were responsible for the pilot evaluation. All authors contributed to and reviewed the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
